scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary holding the Christ Child, seated in the foreground. Behind them stands a nun, also with a halo, reading from a book. The background features a walled town with several buildings, including houses with gabled roofs and a fortified gatehouse. Figures can be seen walking in the distance within the town. The overall composition suggests a devotional scene, possibly depicting a saintly figure in contemplation with the Virgin and Child.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with a Saint
